description:
The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Speer von Elban! – Big Moms verheerender Luftangriff!
Elbaph no Yari: Kyoushuu! Sora Kakeru Big Mom
La lance d`Elbaf ! L`assaut aérien de Big Mom !
The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!
Великое копьё Эльбафа! Нападение! Большая мамочка в воздухе!
رمح إلباف! هجوم بيغ مام الطّائر!
巨人[エルバフ]の槍 強襲! 空翔るビッグ・マム
